title: Online Excel editor
description: Open, edit and export Excel files directly in your browser without installing Office.
features: Open .xlsx, .xls and .csv files in the browser
Edit cell values with search over all rows
Add and remove rows with multi-step undo
Download the edited Excel file while keeping sheet structure

actions.resetConfirm: Are you sure? All changes will be lost.

empty.title: Online Excel editor
empty.description: Open your Excel files without Office, edit them and export a new file. 100% client-side and secure.

page.title: Online Excel editor
page.description: Quickly edit Excel files: change cell values, add or remove rows, and save a new file.
